name: Banacademic Office's Charmony BananAdvisor
description: Originally a Beyond Overcooked loaded with the Charmony Academy syllabus. The educational materials became banaducational materials due to the influence of the memetic virus. The banaxious heart on stage brews a banaphony of flames, vowing to barbeque bad banastudents who don't listen to banadvice to charbanas.

skills.name: Physical Banashment! Take This!
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to one target and their adjacent targets, with a high chance of inflicting "Burn." This ability can only be used while in the "Classroom Channel" state.

skills.name: Collective Banashment! Take This!
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to all targets, with a high chance of inflicting "Burn" on all targets. This ability can only be used while in the "Classroom Channel" state.

skills.name: Monkey No! Emergency Tutoring!
skills.description: Makes one random friendly unit and this unit switch to the "Classroom Channel" state and applies "<u>Tutoring</u>" to them. This can only be used in the "Off-Class Channel" state.

skills.name: Monkey Yes! Holiday Activities!
skills.description: Increases all targets' ATK. This ability can only be used while under the "Off-Class Channel" state.

skills.name: Disrupt Banasyllabus
skills.description: After being attacked, switches the "Classroom Channel" state to the "Off-Class Channel" state. When in "Off-Class Channel" state, will not switch channels after being attacked.

skills.name: Teach Monkeys a Banalesson
skills.description: When attacking, this unit has a chance to apply the Slow state on the target.
